title: Remote Access
summary: Authorize, monitor, and control remote/VPN access according to policy.

title: Wireless Access
summary: Manage and secure wireless APs/clients; require authorization and secure configs.

title: Account Management
summary: Create, modify, disable, and remove accounts; review roles and privileges regularly.

title: Least Privilege
summary: Restrict privileges to the minimum necessary; monitor admin use and escalation.

title: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
summary: Enforce lockout/backoff after a defined number of failed attempts.

title: Audit Generation
summary: Ensure applications/components generate audit records for defined events.

title: Event Logging
summary: Define auditable events and ensure systems generate logs for them.

title: Content of Audit Records
summary: Include timestamp, user, source, and event details sufficient for forensics.

title: Audit Review, Analysis, and Reporting
summary: Regularly review and analyze logs; correlate and report anomalies.

title: Time Synchronization
summary: Synchronize clocks to an authoritative source (e.g., NTP); manage drift.

title: Baseline Configuration
summary: Establish and maintain approved secure baselines for systems.

title: Configuration Change Control
summary: Track, approve, and document changes to the baseline configuration.

title: Configuration Settings
summary: Define and enforce security configuration settings (e.g., CIS benchmarks).

title: System Component Inventory
summary: Maintain an accurate, up-to-date inventory of hardware/software components.

title: Information Backup
summary: Back up data and test restoration; protect backup media.

title: Identification and Authentication (Org Users)
summary: Authenticate users; enforce MFA as appropriate.

title: Authenticator Management
summary: Manage passwords, keys, tokens; rotation and complexity requirements.

title: Incident Handling
summary: Containment, eradication, recovery activities are defined and executed.

title: Incident Monitoring
summary: Track and analyze incidents and trends; maintain metrics.

title: Vulnerability Monitoring and Scanning
summary: Perform routine/authenticated scans and track remediation.

title: Developer Testing and Evaluation
summary: Perform code review and static/dynamic testing in the SDLC.

title: Cryptographic Key Establishment and Management
summary: Establish and manage cryptographic keys securely.

title: Cryptographic Protection
summary: Use approved crypto algorithms and modules appropriately.

title: Protection of Information at Rest
summary: Encrypt data at rest and manage keys securely.

title: Denial-of-Service Protection
summary: Protect against DoS attacks with rate limiting and filtering.

title: Boundary Protection
summary: Enforce network segmentation and filtering at boundaries.

title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
summary: Protect data in transit via TLS/HTTPS and integrity checks.

title: Flaw Remediation
summary: Patch management cadence and monitoring of missing updates.

title: Malicious Code Protection
summary: Deploy and manage anti-malware; scanning and response.

title: System Monitoring
summary: Detect/respond to events using IDS/IPS/SIEM with correlation.

title: Software/Firmware/Information Integrity
summary: Monitor integrity of code/files; FIM and checksums.
